nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.plugin

Class mazeElementLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.plugin.mazeElementLoader

  • public class mazeElementLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads maze element classes (items/tiles/actors) from level files using a URLClassLoader.
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int currentLevel
      To keep track of which level file it is loading from
      private static mazeElementLoader instance 
      private java.net.URLClassLoader loader 
      private java.lang.String path 
      private MazeElementRegistry registry

      • getInstance

        public static mazeElementLoader getInstance()
        Get Instance of the maze element loader.
        Returns:
        a maze element loader singleton

      • SetLevelToLoadFrom

        public void SetLevelToLoadFrom(int levelnum)
        Set the level file (plug-in) that will be searched to find the classes to load.
        Parameters:
        levelnum - the level.

      • getCurrentLevel

        public int getCurrentLevel()
        Gets the current level that the loader will search in to find the classes to load.
        Returns:
        the level

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Gets the current path that the classLoader is loading from.
        Returns:
        the file path that the classes are being loaded from

      • loadTile

        public void loadTile(java.lang.String tileName)
        Load and register a tile class
        Parameters:
        tileName - the name of the tile - this should be the same as the name of the class of that tile (e.g. "Wall", "Free", "LockedDoor", etc.)

      • loadItem

        public void loadItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Load and register a item class
        Parameters:
        itemName - the name of the item - this should be the same as the name of the class of that item (e.g. "Key", "Chip", etc.)

      • loadActor

        public void loadActor(java.lang.String actorName)
        Load and register a actor class
        Parameters:
        actorName - the name of the actor - this should be the same as the name of the class of that actor (e.g. "Chap", "Bug", etc.)
